DOC.brief_summary: This is a multicenter, randomized, double-blind, parallel-group, placebo-controlled study of the efficacy, safety and pharmacokinetics of SAGE-217 in up to 32 adult female subjects diagnosed with severe postpartum depression.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate SAGE-217 in Subjects With Severe Postpartum Depression
